sn45.7:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.7:2.2: Kissa nu kho etam, bhante, adhivacanam:
sn45.7:3.1: Evam vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.7:3.3: Katamam nu kho, bhante, amatam, katamo amatagamimaggo”ti?
sn45.7:3.6: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo amatagamimaggo, seyyathidam—
